text: Chocolat is a 1988 French Cameroonian adventure drama movie directed by first time director Claire Denis and starring Isaach de Bankolé, Giulia Boschi, François Cluzet, Cécile Ducasse, Mireille Perrier, Kenneth Cranham. ==Other websites== * Category:1988 adventure movies Category:1988 drama movies Category:French adventure movies Category:French drama movies Category:Cameroonian movies Category:Movies directed by Claire Denis Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in Cameroon
title: Chocolat (1988 movie)
